title: Out of the cave and onto Facebook - the life of a modern hermit
text: Out of the cave and onto Facebook - the life of a modern hermit MARKET RASEN, England | By Neil Hall and Angus Berwick Sister Rachel Denton checks her Facebook page at St Cuthbert's Hermitage in Lincolnshire, north east Britain August 24, 2015.
